attributes.action: SUPPORT EXPANSION AT SOUTH EAST AIRPORTS
attributes.additional_details:
London airports are losing out to competitors on the continent.
This is damaging to the UK economy which could lead to job losses and lost tax revenue.
London airports are overcrowded and work on 99% capacity, the skies of London are polluted as airplanes need to circle round the city waiting for slots which is wasting £119,000 a day in fuel.
Reverse your ban on new runways and terminals at Heathrow, Gatwick and Stansted and give your support instead as you should be.
